overview: Follow the men of P.J. in their hunt for the dreaded dealer Nicolas Brasse. An infernal pursuit that mixes corruption, slippages, abuse of power and of course ... depravity, both on the side of the cailleras and among the cops! 142 minutes of sulphurous storyline and 7 intense gay porn scenes, filmed like never before. Indic is more than a porn, it's a real French movie!
title: Indic
